name: Tofu con uova di granchio delizioso
desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. The tofu is so tender that it might break if you blew on a spoonful of it. Each granule of the crab roe is plump and filled with crab oil that oozes out onto your lips the moment you have a single bite. Chewing is not needed at all. The food travels down your gullet in a flash, leaving nothing but the memory of its fresh flavor.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

customize.name: Ricetta: tofu con uova di granchio
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Crab Roe Tofu.

customize.name: Uova di granchio
customize.desc: A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.

customize.name: Tofu
customize.desc: Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.

customize.name: Tofu con uova di granchio
customize.desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Crab roe is stir-fried till the oil within oozes out before being added to boiled tofu and accented with broth. Simple, yes, but gloriously fresh.

customize.name: Tofu con uova di granchio sospetto
customize.desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Even the freshest crab roe cannot mask the taste of over-aged tofu. Crushing it up with your chopsticks and mixing it into white rice is all you can do to force it down your gullet.
